channel.title: How to get coordinates?

item.title: How to get coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

[quote=“Lanthus20, post:1, topic:335432”]Hello, I need to get my coordinates for placing items. As you know they are a very important part of making a server but I can’t get them to display! I tried making a coords command that is as follows.

if(command.startsWith("coords") && playerRights > 2) { sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

it does not work![/quote]If you have it where it’s supposed to be, it’s perfect. What you should do is get rid of the 2nd conditional:

if(command.startsWith("coords")) { sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic

item.title: How to get coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @DeathWingz DeathWingz
item.description:
@DeathWingz wrote:

Lanthus20:

umm i’m not sure you get it deathwingz. The command has to be in the server and since it wasn’t I added one that should have worked. Since it didn’t I posted here for help.

I have this added:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 1){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic

item.title: How to get coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

As long as its in the right place it would work. Providing your rights are greater than 2.

item.title: How to get coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

Hello, I need to get my coordinates for placing items. As you know they are a very important part of making a server but I can’t get them to display! I tried making a coords command that is as follows.

if(command.startsWith("coords") && playerRights > 2) { sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

it does not work!
